name: vega

scripts.postbuild: uglifyjs build/vega.js -c -m -o build/vega.min.js && uglifyjs build/vega-core.js -c -m -o build/vega-core.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-schema.json build/vega.js build/vega.min.js build/vega-core.js build/vega-core.min.js && bin/deploy-schema.sh
